shapes

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Rectangle

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract super class inherited by all geometric shapes used in the game
    Author:
    Erik
